casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Harry WOOD. No. 165P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. Constance Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Harry Wood. Teresa H. Pell, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of March 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2005."
